      • baseGetLastLocation

        public io.reactivex.Maybe<android.location.Location> baseGetLastLocation(java.lang.String provider,
                                                                         LocationTime howOldCanBe,
                                                                         io.reactivex.MaybeTransformer[] transformers)
        Returns:
        Result Maybe will not emit any value if location is null. Or it will be emit exception ElderLocationException if howOldCanBe not null and location is too old

      • baseRequestLocation

                                                                          LocationTime timeOut,
                                                                          io.reactivex.SingleTransformer[] transformers)
        Returns:
        Result Single can throw exception ProviderDisabledException or TimeoutException if timeOut not null
